DB_HOST.description: The address of the postgres server. If you used a postgres container, set to the name of the container.

DB_PORT.description: The port the postgres server is listening to.

DB_USER.description: The postgres role with which Odoo will connect. If you used a postgres container, set to the same value as POSTGRES_USER.

DB_PASSWORD.description: The password of the postgres role with which Odoo will connect. If you used a postgres container, set to the same value as POSTGRES_PASSWORD.
